SUB_W17_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.text:
Boy howdy, I'm picking up enough evil mojo
in this world to make my dang hair stand on
end. Or else this place is just filled with
that kind of vibe, maybe? But I'm gonna have to purify the world either
way if I want to find spirits, so better just
knuckle down and get after it.

SUB_W17_SCAN_MIDO_INITIAL_WAVE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_SCAN_MIDO_INITIAL_WAVE_000_CUT_0.text:
That's one heck of a castle, you betcha.
Bet whoever lives in it will know if there's
evil spirits mucking things up around here.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
Be welcome in Brighthome, my new warrior!
I am Din, the king of this land, and full glad
am I that you have answered my call.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
So you called me here, guy?
Er, or Your Majesty, I guess?

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
Just so. I have summoned you hence so you
might join the battle against the forces
of Chaos spreading o'er this land.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
We are set against them in battle without end,
and require aid from warriors across the
Conjoined Worlds that we might continue
our brave endeavor.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
Sounds like this war of yours
ain't going so hot, then.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
Our brave allies continue their valorous fight
across the land—and while we have seen many
victories, so too have we known much of defeat.
Alas, Chaos is not a foe easily laid low.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
I would have you join us as we attempt to
drive our foes back unto the Cleft of Chaos,
located to the far north of this castle.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
I like that confidence, slugger,
but do you really think we can
make that much of a difference?

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
Be this false vanity, or do you truly not
comprehend your own worth as a warrior?

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_010.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_010.text:
The nearby village and fields were set upon
by the forces of Chaos, and the battle to
see them safe is now underway. And while I know it unseemly to ask this so
soon after your arrival in our world, I would
have you lend us your aid, that we might
drive our hated foe into obscurity.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_010.text:
Always glad to help a fella out, but I've
got a question first: You know anything
about spirits around here, maybe?

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_010.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_010.text:
Brighthome is awash in spirits, stranger—
but as we are presently ensnared by the
power of Chaos, I fear beholding them
will prove most difficult. Yet if we can weaken Chaos's hold
on the realm, you should be able
to find the spirits you seek.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_010.text:
Figured it'd be something like that.
Well then, bud? Lead the way.
Let's go thump some Chaos.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_010.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_010.text:
Then I hereby decree you to be our
newest warrior, and grant you the
proud appellation of Seer.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_010.text:
I've actually already got a name, guy—
Tsunanori Mido by the way, hi there—
so I don't need a new one.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_010.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_010.text:
All who find their way to Brighthome
are granted a name by the king, Seer.
This is the way of things.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_010.text:
Well, if that's the rule, that's the rule—
though 'Seer' doesn't strike me as a real
catchy nickname, if I'm being honest.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.speaker: Chief
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.text:
Oh, you must be King Din's newest warrior.
I'm President, and I lead the warrior band
in this village and the surrounding area.
It's good to meet you.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.text:
Right back at you, guy. Also, tough break
that your enemy's strong enough to muck
around this close to the castle.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.speaker: Chief
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.text:
This war is unfolding across all Brighthome—
and when things are going poorly for us on the
other side of the bridges, the forces of Chaos are
able to harry us as they like on this side.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.speaker: Chief
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.text:
That said, they're nowhere near as strong here
as they are at the positions closest to the
Cleft of Chaos, which is why a man like me
can still be of some use. My field is governance, you see.
Not war.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.text:
So you're another one of the
folks King Din called here?

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.speaker: Chief
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.text:
Indeed. From what I understand, the people
of this world can't hold their own in the war
against the forces of Chaos, so they call on
the power of fighters from other worlds.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.text: And how's that war going, eh?

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.speaker: Chief
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.text:
Like I said, it's raging across Brighthome,
which makes it difficult to get an accurate
picture of the entire situation. That's likely
why King Din is expecting so much from you.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.text:
I wonder what all he's hopin' to get out
of me. I only just got here, after all.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.speaker: Chief
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.text:
You have the power to see unobstructed.
To see much. To forecast. To watch. 
That's why you were given your name.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.text:
Cripes. I had no idea my
new name meant all that.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.speaker: Chief
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.text:
While you'll often find yourself facing
many choices, you can only ever aid one
particular area at a time. And while the war will get worse in locations
where you don't help, you can't do anything
about that. You're just one man, after all,
so try to keep that in mind.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.text:
So choosing where I go
is a big deal. Got it. In that case, I should probably check
out the fields and see how things are
going over there.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_TUT_010_CUT_00.speaker: Chief
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_TUT_010_CUT_00.text:
You must be Seer, our new warrior.
I'm President, and I lead the fighters in this village
and the surrounding area. Thanks for the help.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_TUT_010_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_TUT_010_CUT_00.text:
Uh-oh. Did I make a mistake
going to the fields first?

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_TUT_010_CUT_00.speaker: Chief
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_TUT_010_CUT_00.text: Honestly, I was a little disappointed when you went there—but it wasn't wrong, per se. When it comes to where you go, all you can do is make whatever choice you think is best.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_TUT_010_CUT_00.speaker: Chief
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_TUT_010_CUT_00.text:
But as you get deeper into the war and head over
the bridges, you need to have a plan in place—
because any locations on this side that you leave
on their own will be targeted by the enemy. And look, I know our ultimate goal is to
strike at the Cleft of Chaos, but if all
we think about is advancing the line...

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_TUT_010_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_TUT_010_CUT_00.text:
Then everything on this side of the
bridges could end up in big trouble.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_TUT_010_CUT_00.speaker: Chief
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_TUT_010_CUT_00.text:
Yep. Slow and steady progress is the best
course—or at least that's what I think.
Everyone else seems to just want big
flashy results, though, so who knows.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_TUT_010_CUT_00.speaker: Chief
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_TUT_010_CUT_00.text:
Now, c'mon. Let's work together
and liberate Brighthome from the
clutches of Chaos.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Doll
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.text:
Well, you must be King Din's new warrior!
I'm Manikin—I lead the warrior band that
protects these fields.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Doll
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.text:
The war's unfolding all across Brighthome, and
when things are going bad on the other side of
the bridges, the forces of Chaos show up here.
Hell, sometimes they even come to these fields!

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Doll
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.text:
That said, the enemy's pretty weak here
compared to their strength near the
Cleft of Chaos, which is how a fellow
like me can still be useful. So if you need someone to watch over
a field, I'm your guy.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.text:
So you're another one of the
folks King Din called here?

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Doll
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.text:
Sure am! No idea why the king needed a wooden
thing like me to help out, but here I am—and
I want to do the best job I can to aid the people
and fields of this world.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.text: So how's that war going, anyway?

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Doll
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.text:
Buddy, I'm basically a glorified scarecrow—
things like strategy and warfare and all that
are beyond my pay grade. I'm guessing that's
why King Din is expecting so much from you.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.text:
Yeah, I'm not much for those things either,
which is why I don't get why the king has
such high hopes for a guy like me.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Doll
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.text:
Yeah, but he named you the Seer, right?
That means you've got the power to see
things unobstructed—to predict the future,
watch what unfolds, and understand it.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Doll
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.text:
But no matter how much you can see, you can still
only help one place at a time—so the others will
just have to figure out some other way to get by. I know that sounds rough, but trust me,
you'll get used to it. Just remember that
you're not fighting alone, so get out
there and do the best you can, okay?

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.text:
So choosing where I go
is a big deal. Got it. In that case, I should probably wander
over to the village and see how things
are going over there.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FIELD_TUT_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Doll
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FIELD_TUT_010_CUT_000_.text:
Well, you must be King Din's new warrior!
I'm Manikin—I lead the warrior band that
protects these fields.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FIELD_TUT_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FIELD_TUT_010_CUT_000_.text:
Sorry it took me so long to
get over here, guy.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FIELD_TUT_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Doll
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FIELD_TUT_010_CUT_000_.text:
Yeah, it wasn't great watching you head
to the village before us, but I figured
you'd make it out this way eventually.
And now look! Here you are.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FIELD_TUT_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Doll
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FIELD_TUT_010_CUT_000_.text:
Just remember that the closer you get to
the Cleft of Chaos in the hinterlands,
the harder it will be for you to come
back here and help out. Basically, while you're off helping at one
location, positions elsewhere might fall to
the forces of Chaos. It's a huge bummer,
but them's the breaks.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FIELD_TUT_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FIELD_TUT_010_CUT_000_.text:
So I've gotta keep one eye on
the big picture, basically.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FIELD_TUT_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Doll
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FIELD_TUT_010_CUT_000_.text:
Yep. As for me, my job is to keep
an eye on things—and thankfully,
I am GREAT at standing completely
motionless and staring at stuff!

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FIELD_TUT_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Doll
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FIELD_TUT_010_CUT_000_.text:
Now get out there and let's give this
fight all we've got—for Brighthome's
people AND its fields!

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Bully
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
So you're the newcomer, eh, Seer? Tongues around
here are all a'wag about how you're the greatest
thing since milled bread, which is why the king
is expecting all these great things from you. Me though? I don't trust that kind of talk—
and folks like you who encourage it really
chap my cheeks. So I think it's time to knock
you around and show you what's what.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
That's a heck of a welcome there, bud—
but I'm not about to let you kick my rear
and then thank you for the privilege!

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Bully
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Heh. You ain't half bad, Seer.
The name's Bully—or at least that's
what people around here call me.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Bully
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Yeah, that's what I thought:
all talk, no fists. Well, I'm Bully—leader of the warrior band
in these parts. Pretty short name, but you
seem a bit dense, so write it down somewhere
if it helps you remember.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
This is clearly some kind of mine,
but what's the deal here?

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Bully
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
I only just got here myself, so I don't
know a whole lot more than you.
Basically, stuff that's dug up here gets
sent to King Din's castle.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text: So it's the king's mine, eh?

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text: Let's use it to help nearby areas.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text: Let's send more stuff to the king.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Bully
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Heh. I like the way you think, Seer—
sending all this junk off to the king
always struck me as a hell of a waste.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_1.text:
You don't think he'll get mad
and start takin' heads, maybe?

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Bully
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_1.text:
We couldn't fight the forces of Chaos if we
were afraid of what the damn king might do!
Look, I'll just sock him one if he complains,
so don't worry that pretty face about it.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Bully
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_1.text:
So the king's boots ain't been tonguewashed
enough for your liking, eh? Sure thing, Seer.
I hear ya loud and clear.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_GRAVEYARD_TUT_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_GRAVEYARD_TUT_000_CUT_.text:
You must be the new war asset I keep hearing
about. I take it you're traveling the world
like some commando unit? Ah, but that
makes me jealous... Anyway, I'm Warden, and it's my job
to watch over the graveyard.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_GRAVEYARD_TUT_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_GRAVEYARD_TUT_000_CUT_.text:
You got a lot of dead folks that
need babysitting around here?

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_GRAVEYARD_TUT_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_GRAVEYARD_TUT_000_CUT_.text:
When the dead are pulling themselves out of the
dirt and roaming the land? You better believe it.
Hell, that's the dictionary definition of Chaos,
ain't it, pal? That's why the enemy's always got
their beady little eyes fixed on
the corpses here.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_GRAVEYARD_TUT_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_GRAVEYARD_TUT_000_CUT_.text:
On top of that, we've got bodies piling up like
cordwood, and not enough hands to see 'em
properly buried. We're pretty much cleaning
up after the other warrior bands' messes.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_GRAVEYARD_TUT_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_GRAVEYARD_TUT_000_CUT_.text:
Also, King Din might've named me Warden,
but I don't see why I've gotta resign myself
to watching over some moldering old graves. I should be out there saving grand castles,
sacred temples, and ancient ruins. I mean,
hell, any idiot can keep an eye on a grave,
but I was meant for greater things!

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_GRAVEYARD_TUT_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_GRAVEYARD_TUT_000_CUT_.text:
You want a hand looking after
all these graves, maybe?

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_GRAVEYARD_TUT_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_GRAVEYARD_TUT_000_CUT_.text:
Eh, you're good people for offering,
but it's my job, and I'll see it through.
You keep yourself alive out there, y'hear?

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CHURCH_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Vacuum
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CHURCH_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
Hey! You there! I KNOW you're not here
to steal my prey, right? Riiight!? Hmm... Now that I look more closely,
I don't think I've seen your face before.
Which warrior band are you with?

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CHURCH_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CHURCH_TUT_000_CUT_000.text: My name's Tsu... I mean, Seer.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CHURCH_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Vacuum
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CHURCH_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
Ah, right. The new 'reinforcements.'
I heard a warrior with the power to
turn the tide of the war was coming—
though can't say I'm seeing it in you.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CHURCH_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CHURCH_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
People can expect all the great things they
want outta you, but that's still too much
responsibility to put on one person. That's 'cause this isn't the kind of war
that gets turned around by a single person
with some optimistic thoughts. You get me?

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CHURCH_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Vacuum
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CHURCH_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
Still, so long as I get to keep fighting my heart
out, I don't really care what you do or how the
war effort's going overall. I chew up fiends and
spit 'em out, and that's what makes sense to me.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CHURCH_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CHURCH_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
You've got lots of warriors with lots
of different opinions around here,
don't you, bud?

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CHURCH_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Vacuum
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CHURCH_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
I'm just a fighter invited here by King Din.
If you wanna know all the whys and hows,
you'll have to ask the big man himself.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CHURCH_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Vacuum
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CHURCH_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
Now, are you gonna stand here griping
at me all day, or are you gonna get out
there and scope some more positions?

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CITY_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CITY_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
This town get abandoned in the
Chaos invasion, maybe?

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CITY_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Fiore
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CITY_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Some people yet live here,
and we fight to protect them. I am Floral. You are Seer, the one
people are talking about, yes?

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CITY_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CITY_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text: Sure hope they're saying good things.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CITY_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Fiore
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CITY_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Good and bad in equal measure—the good
being that you might be the one who can
bring an end to this wretched war.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CITY_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Fiore
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CITY_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
I will not speak of it, for I place no
stock in rumor. Rather, I would like to
ascertain the truth of you for myself.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CITY_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CITY_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Don't really think I'm anything more
than the guy you're lookin' at.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CITY_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Fiore
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CITY_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Then test your mettle against the forces
of Chaos here in town so I might determine
the truth of you. Epuyke nogonoa kowo!

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FORT_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Arsenal
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FORT_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
I am Gunner. You are Seer, yes?
We have succeeded in retaking
the stronghold, and I thank you
for your assistance.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FORT_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FORT_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
That was a real doozy of a fight there, fella.
Guess I shouldn't be surprised, seeing as
we're basically on top of the Cleft of Chaos.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FORT_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Arsenal
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FORT_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Indeed. This fortress was built to deal with
the mighty fiends that emerge from the Cleft,
but it had fallen into enemy hands long ago.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FORT_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FORT_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text: So do we march on the Cleft now?

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FORT_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Arsenal
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FORT_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
No, the time is not yet right. We will better
our chances at successfully cutting off the
Cleft if we take all the positions around it.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FORT_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FORT_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text: Guess I'll get on that, then.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_TEMPLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_TEMPLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
This looks like a temple right here. Pretty close
to the Cleft of Chaos, but it doesn't seem like
there's any fiends here. Guess the place just
has that kind of power, maybe?

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_TEMPLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Sorceress
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_TEMPLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
Wrong! It is because I,
Sorceress, am here!

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_TEMPLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Sorceress
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_TEMPLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
I was surprised to see another warrior
band here, but then I realized you must
be the newcomer, Seer.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_TEMPLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Sorceress
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_TEMPLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
Ah, what fine timing! The forces of Chaos
have come, drawn as they are to your power.
Now you can show me just what King Din's
secret weapon is made of!

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_TEMPLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Sorceress
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_TEMPLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
You clearly know how to fight, Seer. Perhaps
you truly are the one who will bring an end
to the war with Chaos—not that the prospect
thrills me, if I'm being honest.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Gadget
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Welcome to Hell, Seer. Have you found
the spirits you're looking for?

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
So is this place in sad shape because
of the whole Chaos deal?

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Gadget
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
This place was a ruin well before the
Cleft of Chaos even opened. This is
why it attracts the forces of Chaos,
and why it has become Hell itself.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Pretty calm place, considering it's Hell
and all. Also, does that make you the
king of Hell or something, fella?

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Gadget
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text: You name me the keeper of Hell? Well, aren't you a funny kugutsu wielder.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text: You're a kugutsu! I knew it! What should I call you?

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Gadget
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text: I am Gadget. I have a true kugutsu name, but I cannot speak it to you, as you are a wielder. I work only for His Majesty King Din, after all.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Fair enough, guy. But hey, if you're not
the king of Hell, what are you doing here?
Ferrying people on over or something?

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Gadget
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Call me keeper or ferryman or whatever you
will, because I am sending everything that
emerges from the Cleft of Chaos on to Hell!
Bwaaa ha ha ha ha!

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Gadget
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text: And with that, it appears we have enemies closing in. I'll be certain to share a couple with you, my kugutsu wielder!

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FORT_TUT_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FORT_TUT_010_CUT_000_0.text:
I went to the temple and the ruins,
and met some pretty weird folks.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FORT_TUT_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Arsenal
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FORT_TUT_010_CUT_000_0.text:
Those warriors are interested in nothing save
demonstrating their own strength—they could
not care less about the war or cooperating
with our other positions across the land. That said, they are also the only reason
you and I are able to continue fighting
so close to the Cleft.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FORT_TUT_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FORT_TUT_010_CUT_000_0.text:
You know, guy, I bet you could
convince 'em to work with you
here at the stronghold now.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FORT_TUT_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Arsenal
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FORT_TUT_010_CUT_000_0.text:
I wager this is true—and hope so
as well. For now is our chance
to march on the Cleft of Chaos!

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_HOLE_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_HOLE_000_CUT_000_000.text:
So you have arrived at last.
Well done, Seer.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_HOLE_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_HOLE_000_CUT_000_010.text:
I sure have, guy—but we haven't
secured those ruins yet.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_HOLE_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_HOLE_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Be that as it may, we cannot let
slip this opportunity to strike
at the Cleft of Chaos.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_HOLE_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_HOLE_000_CUT_000_030.text:
You read my mind, fella—and whatever's
waiting for us is gonna get one heck
of a beating!

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_HOLE_010_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_HOLE_010_CUT_000_010.text:
I sure have, guy—but we haven't
secured that temple yet.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_HOLE_020_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_HOLE_020_CUT_000_010.text: What are you doing here, guy?

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_HOLE_020_CUT_000_020.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_HOLE_020_CUT_000_020.text:
I would bear witness to the
final battle for myself.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_HOLE_020_CUT_000_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_HOLE_020_CUT_000_030.text:
Cripes, talk about pressure.
Better make this good if I got
a dang king watchin' me!

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_HOLE_040_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_HOLE_040_CUT_000_010.text:
We owe most of this to
the legendary treasure.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_HOLE_040_CUT_000_020.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_HOLE_040_CUT_000_020.text:
Do not let up! Strike at them
and seal the Cleft!

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_HOLE_040_CUT_000_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_HOLE_040_CUT_000_030.text: Time to make a NEW legend!

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_HOLE_000_CUT_010_000.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_HOLE_000_CUT_010_000.text:
And with that, the Cleft is sealed.
For a time, at least, peace will
reign across the land.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_HOLE_000_CUT_010_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_HOLE_000_CUT_010_010.text:
Is there no way we can just
block this thing up for good?

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_HOLE_000_CUT_010_020.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_HOLE_000_CUT_010_020.text:
We have attempted many approaches—such
as blockading it with soil or water—but ever
does the maw of Chaos yawn wide. All we can do is enjoy a moment's peace
until the time comes when we must
summon warriors once more.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_HOLE_000_CUT_010_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_HOLE_000_CUT_010_030.text: Is it some kind of curse?

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_HOLE_000_CUT_010_040.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_HOLE_000_CUT_010_040.text:
We do not think so. The Cleft's appearance
leads to the arrival of warriors, and we
are able to meet their kind from across
the worlds only when it is opened.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_HOLE_000_CUT_010_050.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_HOLE_000_CUT_010_050.text:
And meeting those folks
is worth all this hassle?

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_HOLE_000_CUT_010_060.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_HOLE_000_CUT_010_060.text:
Indeed! Why, my having met with you is
one of the supreme delights of my life!

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_HOLE_020_CUT_010_020.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_HOLE_020_CUT_010_020.text:
The Cleft of Chaos will open again erelong,
at which point our battle will flare anew.
Warriors will then arrive in Brighthome once
more, for such is the way of things here.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_HOLE_020_CUT_010_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_HOLE_020_CUT_010_030.text:
So you folks just keep fighting?
It never ends?

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_HOLE_020_CUT_010_040.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_HOLE_020_CUT_010_040.text:
Correct, Seer. Brighthome is a world locked
in eternal conflict—but this only makes our
fleeting moments of peace all the sweeter.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_HOLE_020_CUT_010_050.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_HOLE_020_CUT_010_050.text:
I thank you one and all,
my brave warrior bands!

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_HOLE_030_CUT_010_000.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_HOLE_030_CUT_010_000.text:
And thus is the Cleft blocked off.
Your strength was formidable, Seer—
rather too formidable, in fact.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_HOLE_030_CUT_010_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_HOLE_030_CUT_010_010.text: The heck does that mean, guy?

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_HOLE_030_CUT_010_020.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_HOLE_030_CUT_010_020.text:
I so enjoy watching our warriors do battle that
I often find myself wishing the war might go on
forever. Thus did I call you here to shore up
the fighting strength of our bands, but now...

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_HOLE_030_CUT_010_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_HOLE_030_CUT_010_030.text:
Wait, so you're ticked off the battle is over?
I got news for you, fella: that ticks ME off!
Heck, we're all fighting for our lives out there!

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_HOLE_030_CUT_010_040.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_HOLE_030_CUT_010_040.text:
I have no further use for you, Seer.
Begone from my sight.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_HOLE_030_CUT_010_050.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_HOLE_030_CUT_010_050.text:
I'm not gonna begone anywhere until
I find what I came here for, guy!

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_HOLE_040_CUT_010_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_HOLE_040_CUT_010_010.text:
Wait, so we can't seal that Cleft
up for good even though we have
the legendary weapon?

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_HOLE_040_CUT_010_020.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_HOLE_040_CUT_010_020.text:
Correct. The Cleft of Chaos will open again erelong,
at which point our battle will flare anew. New warriors
will then arrive in Brighthome, making this but a single
page in our great history.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_HOLE_040_CUT_010_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_HOLE_040_CUT_010_030.text:
So the legendary treasure's just
gonna disappear somewhere else?

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_HOLE_040_CUT_010_040.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_HOLE_040_CUT_010_040.text: A legend must ever remain a legend.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_HOLE_040_CUT_010_050.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_HOLE_040_CUT_010_050.text:
Yeah, no. That fella's shady as a tree.
Pretty sure he's hiding something.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_TEMPLE_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_TEMPLE_000_CUT_000_000.text:
This looks like a temple right here. Pretty close
to the Cleft of Chaos, but it doesn't seem like
there's any fiends here. Guess the place just
has that kind of power, maybe?

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_TEMPLE_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Sorceress
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_TEMPLE_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Wrong! It is because I,
Sorceress, am here!

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_TEMPLE_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Sorceress
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_TEMPLE_000_CUT_000_020.text:
I was surprised to see another warrior
band here, but then I realized you must
be the newcomer, Seer.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_TEMPLE_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Sorceress
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_TEMPLE_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Ah, what fine timing! The forces of Chaos
have come, drawn as they are to your power.
Now you can show me just what King Din's
secret weapon is made of!

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_TEMPLE_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Sorceress
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_TEMPLE_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Perhaps you truly are the one who will bring
an end to the battle with Chaos. I pray this
might be so, for I have grown weary of war.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_RUIN_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Gadget
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_RUIN_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Why would you come to Hell itself?
Is it really so important that you
find a spirit?

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_RUIN_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_RUIN_000_CUT_000_010.text:
I'm not here because I want to be, bud.
Also, if we're in Hell, that means the
dead should be here. And not to be rude,
but you sure look like one of 'em.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_RUIN_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Gadget
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_RUIN_000_CUT_000_020.text: Me, one of the dead? Bah! How insincere of a kugutsu wielder.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_RUIN_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_RUIN_000_CUT_000_030.text: Ah ha! So you ARE a kugutsu! What should I call you?

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_RUIN_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Gadget
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_RUIN_000_CUT_000_040.text: I am Gadget. I have a true kugutsu name, but I cannot speak it to you, as you are a wielder. I work only for His Majesty King Din, after all.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_RUIN_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_RUIN_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Well, if you're not dead, maybe you can help
a fella out. And believe you me, I could use
all the help I can get, seeing as we're in
literal Hell right here.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_RUIN_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Gadget
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_RUIN_000_CUT_000_060.text:
As though 'help' could even exist in Hell.
If you cling to the thread of salvation,
sooner or later it will snap and send you
plummeting into the abyss.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_RUIN_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Gadget
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_RUIN_000_CUT_000_070.text:
And with that, the enemies close in.
Let us see how you fare, Seer!

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lord
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT_000_.text:
If you've come for a grave, you can dig your own.
I don't have enough hands to be digging one for
everybody who keels over right now.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT_000_.text:
Thanks, but I'm not in the market for a hole
to rot in, fella. But say, were those fiends
trying to rob these graves, maybe?

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lord
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT_000_.text:
They sure as hell were! The dastards come
here, dig up corpses, and turn 'em into
servants of Chaos. And if they manage to take the graveyard,
we'll be up to our armpits in enemies
trying to send us into our own graves.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT_000_.text:
You must be a real strong fella
if they put you in charge of
protecting this place, then.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lord
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT_000_.text:
Hell yeah I'm strong—ask any of the other
warriors around here, and they'll all tell ya
no one holds a candle to the Warden!

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT_000_.text: Well, keep up the good work, bud.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lord
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT_000_.text:
Don't leave! I've got more to say!
...Bah, he's gone.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FORT_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FORT_000_CUT_000_000.text:
The forces of Chaos must be the real deal
if they can build a fortress like this!

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FORT_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Arsenal
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FORT_000_CUT_000_010.text:
They did not build this stronghold—
they stole it from us. This is why
it's proven so difficult to reclaim.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FORT_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FORT_000_CUT_000_020.text:
If it's such an important place, I really wish
everyone did a better job of protecting it in
the first place. But if we DID take it back, it'd be
a quick way to turn the tide in our favor, yeah?

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FORT_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Arsenal
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FORT_000_CUT_000_030.text:
That is correct. Also, I am Gunner,
the leader of the warrior band here.
Thank you for your aid, Seer.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CITY_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CITY_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Did this town get abandoned in
the Chaos invasion, maybe?

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CITY_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Fiore
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CITY_000_CUT_000_010.text:
It did—and soon, every place in this
world will suffer the same fate.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CITY_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CITY_000_CUT_000_020.text:
But that's why we're here, eh?
To stop that from happening?

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CITY_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Fiore
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CITY_000_CUT_000_030.text:
If the warrior bands were truly so powerful,
this war would not have dragged on so long.
Alas, the reality of the war with Chaos is
not so kind as all that.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CITY_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CITY_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Feels like you're gonna laugh at me
if I say I'll do something about it.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CITY_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Fiore
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CITY_000_CUT_000_050.text: I would never mock the Seer.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CITY_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CITY_000_CUT_000_060.text:
Gotta say, this 'I know everything'
attitude's getting on my nerves a bit.
Who are you, anyway?

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CITY_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Fiore
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CITY_000_CUT_000_070.text:
I am Floral, and the land tells me all.
The forces of Chaos will be upon us soon.
I pray you might fight them off, Seer!
Epuyke nogonoa kowo!

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_MINE_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Bully
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_MINE_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Oh, joy. King Din's little plaything
is back. Not looking all that reliable
this time, are you, plaything?

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_MINE_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_MINE_000_CUT_000_010.text:
King called you here same as me, fella.
There's no difference between us.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_MINE_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Bully
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_MINE_000_CUT_000_020.text:
No difference!? NO DIFFERENCE!?
I'll SHOW you the difference, plaything!

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_MINE_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_MINE_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Guess there was a
difference after all.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FIELD_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Doll
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FIELD_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Thanks a ton for your help out here
in the fields. I mean, not that we're
growing anything, but still.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FIELD_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Doll
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FIELD_000_CUT_000_020.text:
'Cause I'm Manikin, a glorified scarecrow
who can't do anything BUT protect fields!

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FIELD_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FIELD_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Eh, fair point, I guess. So what'd
King Din call you for, then?

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FIELD_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Doll
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FIELD_000_CUT_000_040.text:
No idea. Glorified scarecrow, remember?
But there WAS something I realized this
one time when I was staring motionlessly
at the fields...

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FIELD_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FIELD_000_CUT_000_050.text: I bet this'll be a deal.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FIELD_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Doll
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FIELD_000_CUT_000_060.text: There are no crows in Brighthome!

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FIELD_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_FIELD_000_CUT_000_070.text:
Huh. But hey, that's good, right?
Means you're doing your job.
So keep it up, yeah?

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CHURCH_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Vacuum
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CHURCH_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Oh, I'm so glad you're here, Seer!
I've been waiting for you to come
for SO LONG!

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CHURCH_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Vacuum
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CHURCH_000_CUT_000_020.text:
You can take me the hell out of here,
because I absolutely cannot STAND
being here one second longer! C'mon, you can do that, right? Please!
I'll do anything! I'm begging you!

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CHURCH_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CHURCH_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Let's just simmer down there, tiger.
If you take off, what's gonna happen
to this place? Aren't you the one keeping
the forces of Chaos from taking it?

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CHURCH_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Vacuum
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CHURCH_000_CUT_000_040.text:
I chew up fiends and spit 'em back out!
Then I do it again! And again! And AGAIN!
I can't take it anymore! I CAAAAAAN'T!

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CHURCH_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CHURCH_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Sorry, bud, but the king called us here
to do a job, and that's just our fate.
Nothing to be done about it.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CHURCH_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Vacuum
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_CHURCH_000_CUT_000_060.text: No! Don't go! Don't leave me here!

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Chief
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_000_CUT_000_00.text:
If the forces of Chaos are showing up this
close to the castle, this war might finally
be close to ending...in our defeat. Oh. Hello there. I'm President.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_000_CUT_000_01.text:
Sounds like you're losing heart there, guy.
I'm Seer—or at least that's the name the
king gave me. Now let's work together and
do what we can here, yeah?

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Chief
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_000_CUT_000_02.text:
So you're Seer. Well, considering you only
just arrived, I see why you would trust
in King Din's power. But for the rest of us, it doesn't mean
squat. That guy doesn't do a damn thing;
whatever we accomplish, we do on our own.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: Chief
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_000_CUT_000_03.text:
I know the warrior bands are doing their best,
but there's been no indication that the forces
of Chaos are weakening—so if you think I'm
losing heart, that's why.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_000_CUT_000_04.text:
Eh, I'll figure something out—'cause heck,
if we don't win this battle, I might not
get what I actually came here for. So come on, President. Chin up.
We can do this, yeah?

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_000_CUT_000_05.speaker: Chief
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_000_CUT_000_05.text:
Well, you certainly seem confident,
so...I guess I'll trust you.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_000_CUT_000_06.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_000_CUT_000_06.text: Thanks, bud. You won't regret it.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_REBEL_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Immunity
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_REBEL_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Blargh! It's just as I feared! 
The rebels have appeared!

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_REBEL_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_REBEL_000_CUT_000_010.text: What do you mean there, guy?

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_REBEL_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Immunity
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_REBEL_000_CUT_000_020.text:
My name's Immunity, and it's my job to
keep the warriors King Din summoned from
betraying him and joining up with Chaos.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_REBEL_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_REBEL_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Fella sure covers his bases, doesn't he?
But hey, lemme guess: some folks went
off and joined Chaos anyway?

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_REBEL_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Immunity
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_REBEL_000_CUT_000_040.text:
YES, ACTUALLY! THAT'S EXACTLY WHAT THEY DID!
I mean, King Din may have named me Immunity,
but I can't immunize people from wanting to
rebel! Heck, all I really do is carry oxygen...

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_REBEL_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_REBEL_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Then we'll just have to strike before
this little rebellion has a chance to
get any bigger!

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_REBEL_010_CUT_000_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_REBEL_010_CUT_000_030.text:
Fella sure covers his bases, doesn't he?
But hey, lemme guess: you weren't able to
stop it from happening, and then folks went
and attacked this place?

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_REBEL_010_CUT_000_050.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_REBEL_010_CUT_000_050.text:
Don't worry, fella! We're gonna get
out there and put down a rebellion!

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_ITEM_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Buccaneer
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_ITEM_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Where in the hells be that legendary treasure,
by gar!? I searched this blasted castle from
stem to stern, and I ain't been findin' the
gods-damned thing anywhere!

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_ITEM_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_ITEM_000_CUT_000_010.text:
You called here by
King Din too, bud?

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_ITEM_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Buccaneer
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_ITEM_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Yar, cully! Announce yerself before ye appear
and start yer yammerin'! Ye made me jump
outta me skin, so ye did! Gar, but I be Pirate. Who be ye?

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_ITEM_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Buccaneer
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_ITEM_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Gahar har har! King Din's
little trump card! Sorry to break it to ye, cully, but there
already be a treasure hidden here in Brighthome
that can turn the tide of the war without ye—
and I was called here to be sniffin' it out!

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_ITEM_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_ITEM_000_CUT_000_050.text:
...You're just going to steal
it and take off, aren't you?

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_ITEM_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Buccaneer
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_ITEM_000_CUT_000_060.text:
Yar, what kind of base cutpurse
do ye be takin' me for!? Oh, but it matters little—this
whole castle is bare as a pile
of bleached bones.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_ITEM_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_ITEM_000_CUT_000_070.text:
A treasure that can turn the war, eh?
Sounds like that's worth my time.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_NOTFINDITEM_000_CUT_00.speaker: Buccaneer
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_NOTFINDITEM_000_CUT_00.text:
Gar, curse me bones!
It ain't here, neither!

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_NOTFINDITEM_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_NOTFINDITEM_000_CUT_00.text:
Why would a legendary treasure be
sitting in the middle of a village?

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_NOTFINDITEM_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_NOTFINDITEM_000_CUT_00.text:
Manikin isn't gonna be happy
if this lady digs up his fields.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_NOTFINDITEM_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_NOTFINDITEM_000_CUT_00.text:
Somebody would've found the thing
already if it was in the mine.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_NOTFINDITEM_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_NOTFINDITEM_000_CUT_00.text:
Doesn't look like she stole
anything from the church.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_NOTFINDITEM_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_NOTFINDITEM_000_CUT_00.text:
Tsk! C'mon, now. You can't just go
stealing from folks in town.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_NOTFINDITEM_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_NOTFINDITEM_000_CUT_00.text:
If the treasure was here, you'd think
they'd just use it instead of going to
all the trouble of hiding it.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_NOTFINDITEM_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_NOTFINDITEM_000_CUT_00.text: Guess it isn't at the temple.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_NOTFINDITEM_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_NOTFINDITEM_000_CUT_00.text:
Huh. I figured it'd be in the
ruins if it was anywhere.

SUB_W17_FUNC_MIDO_FINDITEM_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Buccaneer
SUB_W17_FUNC_MIDO_FINDITEM_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Gahar har har! I've found it!
The legendary treasure!

SUB_W17_FUNC_MIDO_FINDITEM_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_FUNC_MIDO_FINDITEM_000_CUT_000_0.text:
That's great, bud. Now let's see you
turn the tide of the war with it.

SUB_W17_FUNC_MIDO_FINDITEM_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Buccaneer
SUB_W17_FUNC_MIDO_FINDITEM_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Gar, ye be followin' me,
ye detestable urchin! And aye, I'll turn the tide—but I'll
be keepin' the treasure afterwards!

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Chief
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_00.text:
You pitched in to fight too, Guv?
Much appreciated.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Doll
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_00.text:
Heya, Guv! You helped with the
fighting? Thanks for that!

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Bully
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_00.text:
Been a minute and a half, eh, Guv?
You and I gotta scrap next time!

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Lord
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_00.text:
You were out there fighting, Guv?
My apologies—I did not realize.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Vacuum
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_00.text:
Ha ha ha! Been a long time, Guv!
Let's spar again sometime.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Fiore
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_00.text:
Why, if it isn't Guv!
I thank you for joining the fight.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Arsenal
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_00.text:
Your presence here explains
our victory, Guv. Thank you.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Sorceress
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_00.text:
Well, well. If it isn't Guv.
Surprised you're still out there
fighting and not retired already.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Gadget
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_00.text:
You're looking pretty tired there, Guv.
Ready for your trip to Hell so soon?

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_02.speaker: Guv
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_02.text:
You're Seer, yes? Ah, it's no wonder I felt
that dazzling radiance; with a warrior like
you here, I can finally retire in peace.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_03.speaker: Guv
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_03.text:
I'm done with the warrior's life. Instead,
I'm going to live out the rest of my days
with a girl from town. I pray your fight
goes well, sir.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_03.speaker: Guv
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_03.text:
I'm done with the warrior's life. Instead,
I'm going to live out the rest of my days
with a girl who works in the fields.
I pray your fight goes well, sir.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_03.speaker: Guv
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_03.text:
I'm done with the warrior's life. Instead,
I'm going to live out the rest of my days
with a girl who works in the mine.
I pray your fight goes well, sir.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_03.speaker: Guv
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_03.text:
I'm done with the warrior's life. Instead,
I'm going to live out the rest of my days
with a girl who works in the cemetery.
I pray your fight goes well, sir.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_03.speaker: Guv
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_03.text:
I'm done with the warrior's life. Instead,
I'm going to live out the rest of my days
with a girl from the church. I pray your
fight goes well, sir.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_03.speaker: Guv
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_03.text:
I'm done with the warrior's life. Instead,
I'm going to live out the rest of my days
with a girl from town. I pray your fight
goes well, sir.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_03.speaker: Guv
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_03.text:
I'm done with the warrior's life. Instead,
I'm going to live out the rest of my days
with a girl from the stronghold. I pray
your fight goes well, sir.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_03.speaker: Guv
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_03.text:
I'm done with the warrior's life. Instead,
I'm going to live out the rest of my days
with a girl from the temple. I pray your
fight goes well, sir.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_03.speaker: Guv
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_03.text:
I'm done with the warrior's life. Instead,
I'm going to live out the rest of my days
with a girl from the ruins. I pray your
fight goes well, sir.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_020_CUT_000_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_020_CUT_000_00.text:
I don't see Guv or his girl around.
Wonder how things turned out for them.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_020_CUT_000_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_VILLAGE_020_CUT_000_01.text:
I bet they're living happily
ever after somewhere nice.

SUB_W17_FUNC_MIDO_HELP_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Guv
SUB_W17_FUNC_MIDO_HELP_000_CUT_000_000.text: Ah! You must be the newcomer.

SUB_W17_FUNC_MIDO_HELP_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_FUNC_MIDO_HELP_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Cripes, do I have a stamp on my face
saying I'm the new fella in town?

SUB_W17_FUNC_MIDO_HELP_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Guv
SUB_W17_FUNC_MIDO_HELP_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Age isn't a factor for warriors in Brighthome.
Young and old, known and unknown—warriors of
all stripes are called to this place. But no matter their actual age, every newcomer
has a certain youthful vitality to them—
a vitality I sense now in you.

SUB_W17_FUNC_MIDO_HELP_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Guv
SUB_W17_FUNC_MIDO_HELP_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Alas, such vitality is something a wizened old man
like me has lost. I'm a warrior as well, you see—
though a worn and battered one. Guv is the name
given to me by the king, and all I'll answer to.

SUB_W17_FUNC_MIDO_HELP_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_FUNC_MIDO_HELP_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Well, if you ask me, the only reason we're
still in this fight is because we've got
veterans like you on our side. We'd be wiped out in no time
if all we had were clueless
newcomers like me.

SUB_W17_FUNC_MIDO_HELP_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Guv
SUB_W17_FUNC_MIDO_HELP_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Ha! You've quite the silver tongue,
newcomer! Just make certain you
fight as well as you flatter.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000_000.text:
There's a water spirit here.
I'll have to fight if I want its power.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000_010.text:
There's a weak water spirit here.
Is this one gonna do me all right?

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000_011.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000_011.text:
Got a decently tough water spirit here.
Might be just what the doctor ordered.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000_012.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000_012.text:
Got a real strong water spirit here.
Better make sure I'm ready for a fight.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000_013.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000_013.text:
Cripes, the water spirit here is
real strong. This fella might just
wipe the floor with me.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_SIMON_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Simon
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_SIMON_000_CUT_000_000.text:
With the battle ended, we no longer need
to use the names given to us by the king.
I am called Simon.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_SIMON_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_SIMON_000_CUT_000_010.text:
I'm Tsunanori Mido, bud.
Good to meet you.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_SIMON_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Simon
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_SIMON_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Did you get your hands on that
spirit you were looking for?

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_SIMON_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_SIMON_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Sure did. But hey, did you come here
for something specific yourself?

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_SIMON_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Simon
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_SIMON_000_CUT_000_040.text:
The members of my squadron all perished
in battle—and when I failed to fulfill
my objective, I joined them in death. The next thing I knew, I was waking
here in Brighthome with a new name.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_SIMON_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_SIMON_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Yikes, that's worrisome. I mean, heck,
what if I died at some point and don't
even realize it? I'd better head back to the Heavens
and make sure I'm still tickin'.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_SIMON_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Simon
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_SIMON_000_CUT_000_060.text:
Is my following you
out of the question?

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_SIMON_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_SIMON_000_CUT_000_070.text:
You're welcome to tag along, fella, but are
you sure it's a good idea with the whole
'being dead' deal? I mean, what if you up
and vanish the second you leave Brighthome?

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_SIMON_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Simon
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_SIMON_000_CUT_000_080.text:
I have no intention of fighting for all
eternity in Brighthome. If I disappear,
that is simply as it was meant to be.

SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_SIMON_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W17_EVAR_MIDO_SIMON_000_CUT_000_090.text: In that case, bud, welcome aboard.
